items.value: Looks like the school electricity has been down. What can be the consequences...?
Due to the oversupply of grappling hooks and for better productivity, the school faculty started using them! Be careful!
Somebody found an experimental teleporter... IT'S TIME TO FUN!
A deafening sound wave broke all the windows in the super schoolhouse! Try to stay calm, until your hearing comes back!
Oh, no! There's a fire in the school! Beware of fire to avoid burns!
